metadata_description: MailSniper is a penetration testing tool for searching through email in a Microsoft Exchange environment for specific terms (passwords. insider intel. network architecture information. etc.). It can be used as a non-administrative user to search their own email. or by an administrator to search the mailboxes of every user in a domain.
